con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://sca.opensoa" xmlns:soap12="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap12/" xmlns:sdoXML="commonj.sdo/xml" xmlns:sdo="commonj.sdo" xmlns:mime="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/mime/" xmlns:http="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/http/" xmlns:ns1="http://sca.opensoa" xmlns:wsaw="http://www.w3.org/2006/05/addressing/wsdl" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:jbpm="http://vo.sca.opensoa/xsd" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="qualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://vo.sca.opensoa/xsd"> <xs:element name="listProcessesResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Processes" nillable="true" type="jbpm:ProcessVOType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="listProcesses"> <xs:complexType/> </xs:element> <xs:element name="listProcessInstancesResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="ProcessInstances" nillable="true" type="jbpm:ProcessInstanceVOType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="listProcessInstances"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="ProcessId" nillable="true" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="Filter"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="ALL"/> <xs:enumeration value="RUNNING"/> <xs:enumeration value="SUSPENDED"/> <xs:enumeration value="ENDED"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:complexType name="ProcessVO"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="description" nillable="true" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="hasActions" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="hasEvents" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="id" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="name" nillable="true" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="version" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="running" type="xs:int"/> <xs:attribute name="suspended" type="xs:int"/> <xs:attribute name="ended" type="xs:int"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ActorTasksType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Pooled" type="jbpm:TaskVO"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Assigned" type="jbpm:TaskVO"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="TokensType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Token" type="jbpm:TokenVO"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="TokenVO"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="tokenPath" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="nodeName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="type" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element ref="jbpm:comments"/> <xs:element name="start" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element name="end" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element name="tokenTransitions"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="tokenTransition"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="from" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="to" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:int"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="tokenStatuses"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="isSuspended" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element name="isAbleToReactivateParent" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element name="isLocked" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element name="isRoot" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element name="isTerminatedmplicitly" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element name="isTerminatedImplicit" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element name="hasActiveChildren" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element name="hasEnded" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element name="hasParent" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:long"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="TasksType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Task" type="jbpm:TaskVO"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="comments"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="comment"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="actorId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="message" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="time" type="xs:date"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:complexType name="TaskVO"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="description" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="process"> <xs:complexType> <xs:simpleContent> <xs:extension base="xs:string"> <xs:attribute name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="instanceId" type="xs:long"/> </xs:extension> </xs:simpleContent> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element ref="jbpm:comments"/> <xs:element name="created" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element name="dueDate" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element name="end" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element name="priority" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="start" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element name="actorId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="poolActors"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="actorId" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="transitions"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="transition"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="condition" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="to" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:int"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="statuses"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="isBlocking" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element name="isCancelled" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element name="isLast" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element name="isOpen" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element name="isSignaling" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element name="isStartInstance" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element name="isSuspended" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element name="hasEnded" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="tokenVariables" type="jbpm:ProcessVarsType"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:long"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ProcessVarsType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="var"> <xs:complexType> <xs:simpleContent> <xs:extension base="xs:string"> <xs:attribute name="name" type="xs:string"/> </xs:extension> </xs:simpleContent> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ProcessInstanceVO"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="start" nillable="true" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="end" nillable="true" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="id" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="key" nillable="true" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="version" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="processVariables" type="jbpm:ProcessVarsType"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="isTerminatedImplicitly" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="hasEnded" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="isSuspended" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="name" type="xs:string" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="ver" type="xs:int" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ProcessVOType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="999" minOccurs="0" name="Process" type="jbpm:ProcessVO"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ProcessInstanceVOType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="999" minOccurs="0" name="Instance" type="jbpm:ProcessInstanceVO"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--following used for creating process instances--> <xs:complexType name="ApplicantType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="indicative" type="jbpm:IndicativeType"/> <xs:element name="contactInfo" type="jbpm:ContactInfoType"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="objectId" type="xs:string" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="EmployeeType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="indicative" type="jbpm:IndicativeType"/> <xs:element name="contactInfo" type="jbpm:ContactInfoType"/> <xs:element name="employeeData" type="jbpm:EmployeeDataType"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="objectId" type="xs:long" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="IndicativeType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="familyName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="givenName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="middleName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="dob" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="ids" type="jbpm:idsType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="idsType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="value"> <xs:complexType> <xs:simpleContent> <xs:extension base="xs:string"> <xs:attribute name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="issuedBy" type="xs:string"/> </xs:extension> </xs:simpleContent> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PhonesType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="phone"> <xs:complexType> <xs:simpleContent> <xs:extension base="xs:string"> <xs:attribute name="type" type="xs:string"/> </xs:extension> </xs:simpleContent> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ContactInfoType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="emailAddress" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="phones" type="jbpm:PhonesType"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="address" type="jbpm:AddressType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="EmployeeDataType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="employeeId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="title" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="department" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="location" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="flex" type="jbpm:FlexType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="FlexType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="value"> <xs:complexType> <xs:simpleContent> <xs:extension base="xs:string"> <xs:attribute name="name" type="xs:string"/> </xs:extension> </xs:simpleContent> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="AddressType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="addressline1" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="addressline2" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="municipality" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="region" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="country" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="postalCode" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ProcessType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="key" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="ProcessVars" type="jbpm:ProcessVarsType"/> <!--<xs:choice> <xs:element name="Applicant" type="jbpm:ApplicantType"/> <xs:element name="Employee" type="jbpm:EmployeeType"/> <xs:element name="Other" type="xs:string"/> </xs:choice>--> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="actorId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:attribute name="processName" type="xs:string" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="createProcessInstance"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Process" type="jbpm:ProcessType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="createProcessInstanceResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="processInstanceId" type="xs:long"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="listActorTasks"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="actorId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="Filter"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="ALL"/> <xs:enumeration value="POOLED"/> <xs:enumeration value="ASSIGNED"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="listActorTasksResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="Tasks" type="jbpm:ActorTasksType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="listInstanceTasks"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="ProcessInstanceId" nillable="true" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="Filter"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="ALL"/> <xs:enumeration value="OPEN"/> <xs:enumeration value="SUSPENDED"/> <xs:enumeration value="SIGNALING"/> <xs:enumeration value="ENDED"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="listInstanceTokens"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="ProcessInstanceId" nillable="true" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="Filter"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="ALL"/> <xs:enumeration value="OPEN"/> <xs:enumeration value="SUSPENDED"/> <xs:enumeration value="ENDED"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="listInstanceTasksResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="Tasks" type="jbpm:TasksType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="listInstanceTokensResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="Tokens" type="jbpm:TokensType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:complexType name="ObjectRequestType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="objectId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="objectClassName"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="opensoa.sca.vo.xsd.EmployeeType"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ObjectResponseType"> <xs:choice> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="Employee" type="jbpm:EmployeeType"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="Applicant" type="jbpm:ApplicantType"/> </xs:choice> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="UpdateTokenResponseType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="success" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="UpdateTokenRequest"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="processId" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="tokenPath" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="1" name="action"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="SIGNAL"/> <xs:enumeration value="RESUME"/> <xs:enumeration value="END"/> <xs:enumeration value="SUSPEND"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="transitionName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="comment" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="localVariables" type="jbpm:ProcessVarsType"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="processVariables" type="jbpm:ProcessVarsType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="updateTokenResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element con:call.name: CreateProcessInstance
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsd="http://vo.sca.opensoa/xsd"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <xsd:createProcessInstance> <xsd:Process xsd:processName="NewHireProcess"> <xsd:key>A32-232221</xsd:key> <xsd:ProcessVars> <xsd:var xsd:name="emplName">John Doe</xsd:var> </xsd:ProcessVars> <xsd:Employee> <xsd:indicative> <xsd:familyName>Doe</xsd:familyName> <xsd:givenName>John</xsd:givenName> <xsd:dob>01/01/1901</xsd:dob> </xsd:indicative> <xsd:contactInfo> <xsd:emailAddress>jdoe@yahoo.com</xsd:emailAddress> <xsd:phones> <xsd:phone xsd:type="home">111-111-1111</xsd:phone> </xsd:phones> <xsd:address> <xsd:addressline1>Some Address</xsd:addressline1> <xsd:municipality>Some city</xsd:municipality> <xsd:region>Some state</xsd:region> <xsd:country>Some country</xsd:country> <xsd:postalCode>939221</xsd:postalCode> </xsd:address> </xsd:contactInfo> <xsd:employeeData> <xsd:employeeId>A32-232221</xsd:employeeId> <xsd:title>VP of Planning</xsd:title> <xsd:department>Finance</xsd:department> <xsd:location>Central</xsd:location> </xsd:employeeData> </xsd:Employee> </xsd:Process> </xsd:createProcessInstance> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
